class.name: minestar.production.domain.event.ProductionEvent
class.meta: name=PRODUCTION_EVENT_UNIQ unique=true columns=MACHINE_OID, CLASS_ID, SOURCE_TIMESTAMP_UTC, NAME, STATUS, SOURCE tablespace=MW_IDXENT
type=string description=The machine class OID, of the entity source, when the entity source is a machine. expression=lookupResource.baseEvent.machineClassOID.query
type=string description=The machine class name, of the entity source, when the entity source is a machine. expression=lookupResource.baseEvent.machineClass_N.query

type=float description=The SMU as determined by the SMU Interpolation Service. To be used when SMU value is not available directly from the event. unitType=service meter hours expression=lookupResource.baseEvent.interpolatedSMU.query

id.name: OID
id.meta: The object identifier of the entity, unique within its manager.

property.name: eventSource
property.meta: The object the event came from.

property.name: acknowledged
property.meta: Whether the event has been acknowledged yet.

many-to-one.name: machineRef
many-to-one.meta: The entity the event came from.

property.name: arrivalTime
property.meta: The utc time the event arrived in the office.
The time the event arrived in the office.

property.name: timestamp
property.meta: The utc time the event was created.
The time the event was created.

property.name: sourceTimestamp
property.meta: The utc time the original source of the event says the event was created.
The time the original source of the event says the event was created.

property.name: description
property.meta: A description of the event in the reporting locale.

property.name: englishDescription
property.meta: A description of the event in English. Used for debugging by MineStar support staff.

many-to-one.name: acknowledger
many-to-one.meta: The entity which acknowledged the event.

property.name: nodePublicationTime
property.meta: The node publication utc time for the event
The node publication time for the event

property.name: speed
property.meta: The speed value associated with the event.

property.name: payload
property.meta: The payload value associated with the event.

property.name: movedPayload
property.meta: The moved payload value associated with the event

property.name: carrybackPayload
property.meta: The carryback payload value associated with the event

many-to-one.name: operator
many-to-one.meta: The equipment operator associated with the event.

component.name: location
component.meta: The equipment location information associated with the event.

component.name: state
component.meta: The equipment state information associated with the event.

property.name: manualOverride
property.meta: Is a manual override in effect

property.name: statusAutoFlag
property.meta: Production delay report status auto flag

property.name: statusManualFlag
property.meta: Production delay report status manual flag

map.name: fluids
map.meta: The fluid and lube types for this event

property.name: weighingTime
property.meta: The time taken to weight the bucket

property.name: eventMask
property.meta: A mask value to filter events

property.name: payLoadMaterialDensity
property.meta: The loader payload material density value.

property.name: materialName
property.meta: The MATERIAL NAME in text format

property.name: loadSiteName
property.meta: The LOAD SITE NAME in text format

property.name: truckName
property.meta: The TRUCK NAME in text format

subclass.name: minestar.production.domain.event.UGMLoaderCycleReportEvent
subclass.meta: A UGM loader cycle report event.

property.name: weighingTime
property.meta: The time taken to weight the bucket

property.name: eventMask
property.meta: A mask value to filter events

property.name: payLoadMaterialDensity
property.meta: The loader payload material density value.

property.name: materialName
property.meta: The MATERIAL NAME in text format

property.name: loadSiteName
property.meta: The LOAD SITE NAME in text format

property.name: truckName
property.meta: The TRUCK NAME in text format

property.name: exception
property.meta: An exception for the load report

property.name: expectedValuesColumn
property.meta: A forward slash separated list of expected values

property.name: swingAngle
property.meta: The swing angle of the load

property.name: strValue
property.meta: The string value of the CAES parameter

property.name: numValue
property.meta: The numeric value of the CAES parameter

property.name: strValue
property.meta: The string value of the CAES parameter

property.name: numValue
property.meta: The numeric value of the CAES parameter

map.name: waypointRefs
map.meta: The waypoints of the crusher event

map.name: waypointRefs
map.meta: The waypoints of the crusher event

property.name: nameActual
property.meta: The actual name of the drill hole.

property.name: blastActual
property.meta: The blast the hole was actually drilled for.

property.name: patternActual
property.meta: The pattern the hole was actually a part of.

property.name: nameDesign
property.meta: The name of the drill hole according to the design.

property.name: blastDesign
property.meta: The blast the hole was designed to be drilled for.

property.name: patternDesign
property.meta: The pattern the drill hole was designed to be a part of.

property.name: holeType
property.meta: The type of the drill hole.

property.name: energyDissipated
property.meta: Energy dissipated by the bit in this cycle

property.name: sliceAverageWOB
property.meta: The slice average Weight On Bit

property.name: sliceAverageROP
property.meta: The slice average Rate of Penetration
